00028  * file format pdf, S.O and S.O2 are the given atom types.
00029  *
00030  * Revision 1.3  2007/10/11 17:22:30  vanvoor4
00031  * S.o2 is more likely to be encountered than S.O2 not sure why
00032  * S.O2 was here in first place
00033  *

00045 #ifndef MOL2_ATOMS_HEADER_INCLUDED
00046 #define MOL2_ATOMS_HEADER_INCLUDED

00048 #include <AtomTypes.H>

00050 namespace SimSite3D{
00051 
00053   typedef enum mol2_bond_enum{
00054     UNKNOWN_BOND = 0,
00055     SINGLE_BOND,
00056     DOUBLE_BOND,
00057     TRIPLE_BOND,
00058     AMIDE_BOND,
00059     AROMATIC_BOND,
00060     DUMMY_BOND,
00061     NOT_CONNECTED
00062   }bond_type;
00063   
00064   typedef struct{
00065     std::string bond_type_str;
00066     bond_type type;
00067   }mol2_bond_info_t;
00068   
00069   const uint mol2_bond_table_size = 8;
00070   const mol2_bond_info_t mol2_bond_table[] = {
00071     { "un", UNKNOWN_BOND  },
00072     { "1" , SINGLE_BOND   },
00073     { "2" , DOUBLE_BOND   },
00074     { "3" , TRIPLE_BOND   },
00075     { "am", AMIDE_BOND    },
00076     { "ar", AROMATIC_BOND },
00077     { "du", DUMMY_BOND    },
00078     { "nc", NOT_CONNECTED }
00079   };
00080   
00081   typedef struct{
00082     std::string atom_type_str;
00083     atom_type atom;
00084     orbit_type orbit;
00085     my_float_t vdw_radii;
00086   }mol2_atom_info_t;
00087
